english.segment1: you are strong yet humble. so wise but still meek. your love is reaching out to all with need. bring us home. i want to be like Jesus. i want a heart of complete compassion. i want to serve others. in this i obey the father in everything i do to reach the lost for you. denying myself everyday. bringing glory to his name. you're so worthy of praise in all that you do. when i give myself completely. i get a revelation of you..
